family_cancer.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with cancer?

family_heart.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with heart disease (e.g., heart attack, coronary artery disease)?

family_stroke.question: Has any biological family member had a stroke?

family_diabetes.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with diabetes?

family_hypertension.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with high blood pressure (hypertension)?

family_kidney.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with kidney disease?

family_neurological.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with a neurological condition (e.g., Alzheimer's, Parkinson's)?

family_epilepsy.question: Has anyone in your family been diagnosed with epilepsy or seizure disorders?

family_longevity.question: Have most of your biological family members lived beyond the age of 75?

family_death_cause.question: If a biological parent has passed away, what was the cause?

family_mental_illness.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with a mental health condition (e.g., depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia)?

family_bones.question: Has anyone in your family been diagnosed with osteoporosis, arthritis or chronic joint pain?

family_obesity.question: Has any biological family member struggled with obesity?

family_cholesterol.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with high cholesterol?

family_liver.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with liver disease (e.g., hepatitis, cirrhosis)?

family_autoimmune_disease.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with an autoimmune disorder (e.g., lupus, multiple sclerosis)?

family_anemia.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with anemia?

family_pregnancy.question: Has anyone in your family experienced complications during pregnancy (e.g., preeclampsia, gestational diabetes)?

family_circulatory.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with circulation problems (e.g., peripheral artery disease, varicose veins)?

family_respiratory.question: Has any biological family member been diagnosed with a respiratory condition?
